symptomIntake.title: Report Your Symptoms
symptomIntake.subtitle: Please describe your symptoms so we can help you find the right care
symptomIntake.primaryComplaintPlaceholder: Describe your main symptom or concern...
symptomIntake.duration: How long have you had these symptoms?
symptomIntake.associatedSymptoms: Do you have any other symptoms?
symptomIntake.associatedSymptomsPlaceholder: List any other symptoms you're experiencing...
symptomIntake.medicalHistoryPlaceholder: Any relevant medical conditions, medications, or allergies...
symptomIntake.emergencyWarning: If this is a medical emergency, please call emergency services immediately or go to the nearest hospital.

validation.durationRequired: Please select how long you've had these symptoms
validation.severityRequired: Please rate the severity of your symptoms

symptomIntake.submitSuccess: Your symptoms have been reported successfully. You will receive care recommendations shortly.
symptomIntake.submitError: There was an error submitting your symptoms. Please try again.

triage.title: Care Recommendations
triage.subtitle: Based on your symptoms, here are our recommendations:
triage.emergencyMessage: Please seek immediate medical attention at the nearest emergency room.
triage.urgentMessage: You should see a healthcare provider within the next few hours.
triage.routineMessage: Schedule an appointment with a healthcare provider in the next few days.
triage.selfCareMessage: You may be able to manage this at home with proper self-care.
triage.pendingValidation: Your case is being reviewed by a healthcare professional. Please wait for recommendations.

providers.title: Healthcare Providers
providers.subtitle: Recommended providers based on your needs
providers.noProviders: No providers found matching your criteria

episodes.title: My Care Episodes
episodes.subtitle: Track your healthcare journey
episodes.noEpisodes: You don't have any care episodes yet

offline.title: Offline Mode
offline.message: You are currently offline. Your data will be saved and synchronized when you reconnect.
